article.title: Setting up rmate with Sublime Text for remote file editing over SSH
article.author: Daniel Demmel
article.excerpt: Instead of terminal editors with steep learning curve, this guide helps you to tunnel Sublime Text in to your server for remote editing. With sudo!

authors.bio: Design technologist / web dev @berylbikes, ex @ustwo, ♥ open source, degrowth & spiritual ecology activist, minimalist, vegetarian, @zzuuu's husband, dad, INTP
authors.name: Daniel Demmel
